author: Robert Henson

comments.message: some threads have said too much uv can  be harmful for people...how might that come into play in your design ?

description: Hands free battery powered sterilization uv cuff
summary: I was on the commode this morning and I had a great idea. What if there were a battery powered cuff that would fit around each wrist with a ring light , similar to one used in photography, that emitted uv light to sterilize your hands.  Ideally it would fit over the haz suit and gloves.
title: Ultraviolet led cuffs
